sql.name: queryXhKhzxList
sql.sqlString: select * from ( select a.ZXBM,/*咨询编码*/ a.KHMC,/*咨询客户名称*/ a.SEX,/*性别*/ a.TELEPHONE,/*固定电话*/ a.PHONE,/*移动电话*/ a.CRTY,/*城市*/ a.GT_TIME,/*沟通时间*/ ( select name from base_city z where z.id=a.crty ) as cityname, to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss') as CREARTIME,/*创建时间s*/ a.GTJL,/*沟通记录*/ a.EMPLOYEE_CRM,/*销售人员*/ ( select name from BASE_EMPLOYEE z where z.id = a.EMPLOYEE_CRM )as EMPLOYEE_CRM_name, a.EMPLOYEE_CCA,/*销售人员*/ ( select name from BASE_EMPLOYEE z where z.id = a.EMPLOYEE_CCA )as EMPLOYEE_CCA_name, a.CRMPROVINCE,/*省份*/ ( select name from base_city z where z.id=a.crmprovince ) as crmprovincename, a.ZHUANG_TAI,/*状态*/ a.ID, a.create_by, a.organi_id, ( select x.RGANI_NAME from BASE_ZZJG x where x.id =( select y.PARENT_ID from BASE_ZZJG y where y.id =(select ORGANI_ID from BASE_EMPLOYEE z where z.id = a.employee_crm)) ) as yyb, ( select x.id from BASE_ZZJG x where x.id =( select y.PARENT_ID from BASE_ZZJG y where y.id =(select ORGANI_ID from BASE_EMPLOYEE z where z.id = a.employee_crm)) ) as yybid from XH_XYDKZX a where 1=1 $sql ) z where 1=1 $sql2
